metadata.title: CVE-2021-3669 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description: A flaw was found in the Linux kernel. Measuring usage of the shared memorydoes not scale with large shared memory segment counts which could lead toresource exhaustion and DoS.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
